attributes.action: Break off diplomatic and economic relations with Russia
attributes.additional_details: Break off all diplomatic and economic ties with Russia and expel all Russian diplomats from the UK and sovereign states until Russia conform to the letter of international law and acknowledge their wrong doing and cease and desist against the persecution of the people Ukraine and Russian attempts to overthrow a government. To push for Russia to renounce the legislation which equates to a persecution of the LGBT community. Furthermore to cease all assets of known Russians within the reach of UK law and influence the EU community to do the same....
